meanings.definition: A three-dimensional image created by superimposing two offset images, typically red and cyan, to produce a stereoscopic effect.
meanings.sent1: The anaglyphs on the screen seemed to pop out at me.
meanings.sent2: I put on my anaglyph glasses to see the 3D effect.
meanings.sent3: The anaglyphs made it look like the characters were coming to life!
meanings.sent4: The anaglyphs transformed the flat pictures into a world of depth and color.
meanings.sent5: The anaglyphs were so realistic, I felt like I could reach out and touch them.

meanings.definition: A pair of glasses with lenses of different colors used to view anaglyphs.
meanings.sent1: I need to wear my anaglyphs to enjoy the 3D movie.
meanings.sent2: The anaglyphs helped me see the hidden images in the picture.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sat on my anaglyphs and now they're all bent!
meanings.sent4: With the anaglyphs on, the world looked like a colorful dream.
meanings.sent5: The anaglyphs enhanced the details in the image, making it come alive.
